verses.verse: וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> Wherefore שְׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> I pray thee hear נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job מִלָּ֑י <S%H4405><s%> my speeches וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all דְּבָרַ֥י <S%H1697><s%> to all my words הַאֲזִֽינָה׃ <S%H238><s%> and hearken

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now פָּתַ֣חְתִּי <S%H6605><s%> Behold now I have opened פִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth דִּבְּרָ֖ה <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken לְשׁוֹנִ֣י <S%H3956><s%> my tongue בְחִכִּֽי׃ <S%H2441><s%> in my mouth

יֹֽשֶׁר־ <S%H3476><s%> [shall be of] the uprightness לִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> of my heart אֲמָרָ֑י <S%H561><s%> My words וְדַ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <S%H8193><s%> and my lips בָּר֥וּר <S%H1305><s%> clearly מִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <S%H4448><s%> shall utter

רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> The Spirit אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> of God עָשָׂ֑תְנִי <S%H6213><s%> hath made וְנִשְׁמַ֖ת <S%H5397><s%> me and the breath שַׁדַּ֣י <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty תְּחַיֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> hath given me life

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תּוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> If thou canst הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נִי <S%H7725><s%> answer עֶרְכָ֥ה <S%H6186><s%> me set [thy words] in order לְ֝פָנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> before הִתְיַצָּֽבָה׃ <S%H3320><s%> me stand up

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> to thy כְפִ֣יךָ <S%H6310><s%> Behold I [am] according to thy wish לָאֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> in God's מֵ֝חֹ֗מֶר <S%H2563><s%> out of the clay קֹרַ֥צְתִּי <S%H7169><s%> stead I also am formed גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> too אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵ֭מָתִי <S%H367><s%> Behold my terror לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תְבַעֲתֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1204><s%> shall not make thee afraid וְ֝אַכְפִּ֗י <S%H405><s%> neither shall my hand עָלֶ֥יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִכְבָּֽד׃ <S%H3513><s%> be heavy

אַ֭ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely אָמַ֣רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> Surely thou hast spoken בְאָזְנָ֑י <S%H241><s%> in mine hearing וְק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice מִלִּ֣ין <S%H4405><s%> of [thy] words אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> and I have heard

זַ֥ךְ <S%H2134><s%> I am clean אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I בְּֽלִ֫י <S%H1097><s%> without פָ֥שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> without transgression חַ֥ף <S%H2643><s%> I [am] innocent אָנֹכִ֑י <S%H595><s%> and there וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> is no עָוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> neither [is there] iniquity לִֽי׃

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold תְּ֭נוּאוֹת <S%H8569><s%> occasions עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> Behold he findeth יַחְשְׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H2803><s%> against me he counteth לְאוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> me for his enemy לֽוֹ׃
יָשֵׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> He putteth בַּסַּ֣ד <S%H5465><s%> in the stocks רַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> my feet יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> he marketh כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אָרְחֹתָֽי׃ <S%H734><s%> all my paths

הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not צָדַ֣קְתָּ <S%H6663><s%> Behold [in] this thou art not just אֶעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <S%H6030><s%> I will answer כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> is greater אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> thee that God מֵאֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H582><s%> than man

מַ֭דּוּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> against רִיב֑וֹתָ <S%H7378><s%> Why dost thou strive כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all דְּ֝בָרָ֗יו <S%H1697><s%> of any of his matters לֹ֣א־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H6030><s%> against him? for he giveth not account

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed בְאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> once יְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> speaketh אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> For God וּ֝בִשְׁתַּ֗יִם <S%H8147><s%> yea twice לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7789><s%> [yet man] perceiveth

בַּחֲל֤וֹם ׀ <S%H2472><s%> In a dream חֶזְי֬וֹן <S%H2384><s%> in a vision לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of the night בִּנְפֹ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> sleep falleth תַּ֭רְדֵּמָה <S%H8639><s%> when deep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> men בִּ֝תְנוּמ֗וֹת <S%H8572><s%> in slumberings עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> in מִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H4904><s%> upon the bed

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יִ֭גְלֶה <S%H1540><s%> Then he openeth אֹ֣זֶן <S%H241><s%> the ears אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> of men וּבְמֹ֖סָרָ֣ם <S%H4561><s%> their instruction יַחְתֹּֽם׃ <S%H2856><s%> and sealeth

לְ֭הָסִיר <S%H5493><s%> That he may withdraw אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man מַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H4639><s%> [from his] purpose וְגֵוָ֖ה <S%H1466><s%> pride מִגֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> from man יְכַסֶּֽה׃ <S%H3680><s%> and hide

יַחְשֹׂ֣ךְ <S%H2820><s%> He keepeth back נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from שָׁ֑חַת <S%H7845><s%> from the pit וְ֝חַיָּת֗וֹ <S%H2416><s%> and his life מֵעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> from perishing בַּשָּֽׁלַח׃ <S%H7973><s%> by the sword

וְהוּכַ֣ח <S%H3198><s%> He is chastened בְּ֭מַכְאוֹב <S%H4341><s%> also with pain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁכָּב֑וֹ <S%H4904><s%> upon his bed [וְרִיב כ] (וְרֹ֖וב <S%H7379><s%> adversary ק) עֲצָמָ֣יו <S%H6106><s%> of his bones אֵתָֽן׃ <S%H386><s%> with strong

וְזִֽהֲמַ֣תּוּ <S%H2092><s%> abhorreth חַיָּת֣וֹ <S%H2416><s%> So that his life לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> and his soul מַאֲכַ֥ל <S%H3978><s%> meat תַּאֲוָֽה׃ <S%H8378><s%> dainty

יִ֣כֶל <S%H3615><s%> is consumed away בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <S%H1320><s%> His flesh מֵרֹ֑אִי <S%H7210><s%> that it cannot be seen [וּשְׁפִי כ] (וְשֻׁפּ֥וּ <S%H8205><s%> high place ק) עַ֝צְמוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6106><s%> and his bones לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not רֻאּֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> [that] were not seen

וַתִּקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> draweth near לַשַּׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> unto the grave נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> Yea his soul וְ֝חַיָּת֗וֹ <S%H2416><s%> and his life לַֽמְמִתִֽים׃ <S%H4191><s%> to the destroyers

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> If there עָלָ֨יו ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and מַלְאָ֗ךְ <S%H4397><s%> be a messenger מֵלִ֗יץ <S%H3887><s%> with him an interpreter אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> out אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> among a thousand לְהַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> to shew לְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> unto man יָשְׁרֽוֹ׃ <S%H3476><s%> his uprightness

וַיְחֻנֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H2603><s%> Then he is gracious וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and saith פְּ֭דָעֵהוּ <S%H6308><s%> Deliver מֵרֶ֥דֶת <S%H3381><s%> him from going down שָׁ֗חַת <S%H7845><s%> to the pit מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> I have found כֹֽפֶר׃ <S%H3724><s%> a ransom

רֻֽטֲפַ֣שׁ <S%H7375><s%> shall be fresher בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <S%H1320><s%> His flesh מִנֹּ֑עַר <S%H5290><s%> than a child's יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> he shall return לִימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> to the days עֲלוּמָֽיו׃ <S%H5934><s%> of his youth

יֶעְתַּ֤ר <S%H6279><s%> He shall pray אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱל֨וֹהַּ ׀ <S%H433><s%> unto God וַיִּרְצֵ֗הוּ <S%H7521><s%> and he will be favourable וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> unto him and he shall see פָּ֭נָיו <S%H6440><s%> his face בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> with joy וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> for he will render לֶ֝אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> unto man צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness

יָשֹׁ֤ר ׀ <S%H7789><s%> He looketh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> upon men וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and [if any] say חָ֭טָאתִי <S%H2398><s%> I have sinned וְיָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right הֶעֱוֵ֗יתִי <S%H5753><s%> and perverted וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not שָׁ֥וָה <S%H7737><s%> and it profited לִֽי׃

פָּדָ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> He will deliver [נַפְשִׁי כ] (נַ֭פְשֹׁו <S%H5315><s%> any ק) מֵעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> from going בַּשָּׁ֑חַת <S%H7845><s%> into the pit [וְחַיָּתִי כ] (וְ֝חַיָּתֹו <S%H2416><s%> age ק) בָּא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall see הֶן־ <S%H2005><s%> behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner

אֵ֭לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יִפְעַל־ <S%H6466><s%> Lo all these [things] worketh אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God פַּעֲמַ֖יִם <S%H6471><s%> anvil שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with גָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H1397><s%> with man

לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> To bring back נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from שָׁ֑חַת <S%H7845><s%> from the pit לֵ֝א֗וֹר <S%H215><s%> to be enlightened בְּא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> with the light הַֽחַיִּים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

הַקְשֵׁ֖ב <S%H7181><s%> Mark well אִיּ֥וֹב <S%H347><s%> O Job שְֽׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> hearken לִ֑י הַ֝חֲרֵ֗שׁ <S%H2790><s%> unto me hold thy peace וְאָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> me אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> and I will speak אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> there are

מִלִּ֥ין <S%H4405><s%> any thing to say הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נִי <S%H7725><s%> answer דַּ֝בֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> me speak כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָפַ֥צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> for I desire צַדְּקֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H6663><s%> to justify

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אַ֭יִן <S%H369><s%> else אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you שְֽׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> If not hearken לִ֑י הַ֝חֲרֵ֗שׁ <S%H2790><s%> unto me hold thy peace וַאֲאַלֶּפְךָ֥ <S%H502><s%> and I shall teach חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> thee wisdom ס
